name: gpii-macos
description: Components of the GPII personalization infrastructure for use on Apple's macOS
author: Raising the Floor -- US Inc.

scripts.build: xcodebuild clean -configuration Release && xcodebuild build -configuration Release && mv build/Release/libMorphicMacOS.dylib build/MorphicMacOS.node
scripts.build:dev: xcodebuild clean -configuration Release && xcodebuild build -configuration Debug && mv build/Debug/libMorphicMacOS.dylib build/MorphicMacOS.node
